RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Once I spruce up my wardrobe with a few
Misko pieces, maybe I'll go west to <clr:0000>Lucky
Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>They've got a set of <clr:0000>froggy clothes<clr:ffff> there.
Wouldn't it be nice to travel through the
rain in comfort?
Talk_001_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble>I'm sorry to say that I don't have any
info on <clr:0000>Misko's treasure <clr:ffff>right now...<sp:0:4:0>I went out west to a <clr:0000>cave near Foothill
Stable<clr:ffff> to ask those treasure-hunting
brothers to share what they'd heard...
But they wouldn't tell me anything. So
much for respecting your elders...
Talk_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Y'know, those clothes really do look
froggy. A perfect design for a rainy day.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>That's a great outfit, fella! You're making
an old man jealous.
Talk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Wellll, truth be told, I don't have any
information to share.<sp:0:4:0>Wish I could say different. I heard tell that
this pair of treasure-hunting brothers
might have a lead...<sp:0:4:0>But I went way out west to <clr:0000>the cave near
Foothill Stable <clr:ffff>to talk to them, and
they still wouldn't tell me anything.
Talk_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>At first I thought I might ask the horse
god <clr:0000>Malanya<clr:ffff> to grant my wish.<sp:0:4:0>But I'm too scared to get any closer, so
I'll just do my wishing from here...
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>That's why I plan on going to <clr:0000>East Akkala
Stable<clr:ffff> and making a wish to the horse
god Malanya. Maybe he can guide me!<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
East Akkala Stable is an establishment on
the <clr:0000>eastern edge <clr:ffff>of Hyrule.<sp:0:4:0>Sure, I might have been tricked into
going, but I've always wanted to see
what the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> had to offer.
There's joy in any journey, so long as
you look.
GoRange_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I went to <clr:0000>East Akkala Stable<clr:ffff> to make a
wish to the horse god <clr:0000>Malanya<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I asked him to help me find the treasure!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>Wishes are tricky things. If it doesn't
come true right away, I can always go
back and make the wish again!
Besides, this gives me a chance to finally
explore the <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>There's joy in the
journey, treasure or no treasure.
talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hey, I know you!<sp:5:0:0> You're the fella who
showed the All-Clucking Cucco for what
it was. <sp:5:0:0>A sham. A Yiga Clan trap.
I would have stayed fooled, if not for you.
So...thanks!

Still, I couldn't help wondering if there
might've something to that prophecy.<sp:5:1:0>
Now here I am, in Akkala.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Have you ever heard of <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
It's a <clr:0000>collection of rare clothes<clr:ffff> gathered
up and hidden away by the bandit Misko!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm fairly sure a piece of that treasure is
tucked away in a cave here in Akkala!

You helped me out of a jam, so I'll tell you
everything I know. If you're interested,
just ask!
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rumor has it there are rare clothes
stashed somewhere on Lomei Labyrinth
Island <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> of here.
But it's so far off coast, there's no way to
swim there. You'd need an <clr:0000>undersea
tunnel<clr:ffff> or something to reach it.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Rumor has it there are rare clothes
stashed somewhere on Lomei Labyrinth
Island <clr:0000>northeast<clr:ffff> of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:TalkDeny_00>But it's waaay out in the ocean. <sp:5:0:0>If I tried
swimming there, I'd end up very drowned.

Makes you wish there was an <clr:0000>undersea
tunnel <clr:ffff>between here and there, huh?
talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, fella! <sp:5:1:0>Want me to bend your ear
about <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>?
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You ever wear <clr:0000>froggy clothes<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>They're
said to keep you nice and comfortable
when it's raining. Like now.
<sp:3:0:2:0500>There are some on display at the Lucky
Clover Gazette, I hear, but that's so far
to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>. All the way in Hebra!
RainPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Now, this has nothing to do with any of
Misko's outfits, but...
